entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mayo Airport 7:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
